3.name: Money
3.description: A single gold coin. Devalues over time.

4.name: A Rock
4.description: A rock. Can't be more obvious. Increases underwater fall speed.

5.name: Big Rock
5.description: A large rock that is very big. Really increases underwater fall sepeed.

6.name: Diving Gear
6.description: Not to be confused with dining gear. Extends breath underwater.

7.name: Skeleton Necklace
7.description: Pulsing with some kind of ancient energy. Or delusion. Does a small amount of damage per second to nearby enemies.

8.name: The Skeleton King's Hand
8.description: It's the Skeleton King's Hand! You know, the skeleton king? yeah. Lifesteal on hit.

9.name: Cross
9.description: The power of nondescript higher power compells you! Does more damage to undead monsters.

10.name: A Sopping Wet Copy of Moby Dick
10.description: It's like the real thing. Does more damage to fish monsters.

11.name: Can O' Spinach
11.description: A media tie-in deal with the hit 2005 videogame featuring a particular strongarm sailor. Increase to health
